title.rendered: Bengal vs Baroda, Indian First-Class Trophy 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Bengal: Sayan Mondal, Abhimanyu Easwaran, Sudip Kumar Gharami, Anustup Majumdar, Manoj Tiwary (c), Shahbaz Ahmed, Abishek Porel (wk), Pradipta Pramanik, Akash Deep, Geet Puri, Ishan Porel

Baroda: Jyotsnil Singh, Pratyush Kumar, Mitesh Patel (wk), Vishnu Solanki (c), Shashwat Rawat, Ninad Rathva, Priyanshu Moliya, Mahesh Pithiya, Bhargav Bhatt, Lukman Meriwala, Dhruv Patel

Pitch Report

Venue: Bengal Cricket Academy Ground, West Bengal

Type: Excellent for batting.

Weather: Clear

Fantasy Tips of the Day

As has been the case for the past few seasons, Abhimanyu Easwaran is the highest run-scorer. He has accumulated 417 runs at an incredible average of 208, including 2 hundreds and a fifty. If anything, he is a delight for the fantasy players.

For Baroda, Priyanshu Moliya has hit the bulk of the runs. He has featured in the Ultimate Team in 3 of 4 games.

The last time Manoj Tiwary batted at the venue, he scored a spectacular triple-century. He has not been consistent this season, but playing at home must keep his confidence high.

Shahbaz Ahmed has been provided fantasy points with both bat and ball. He has scored 207 runs and taken 15 wickets.

Of the 55 wickets Baroda have taken, 35 belong to Ninad Rathva and Bhargav Bhatt.
